00024 /*!*****************************************************************************
00025  *******************************************************************************
00026  \note  readLWPRScriptMulti
00027  \date  February 1996
00028  
00029  \remarks 
00030  
00031  Reads multiple LWPR models using only one script file, i.e., assuming that
00032  the models share all the parameters except for the name. 
00033  
00034  *******************************************************************************
00035  Function Parameters: [in]=input,[out]=output
00036  
00037  \param[in]     fname   : name of the script
00038  \param[in]     new_flag: TRUE = force the creation of a new LWPR
00039               FALSE = try to read the LWPR from file first
00040  \param[in]     IDs     : array of which ID number should be given to the lwprs
00041  \param[in]     names   : names of the lwpr models (pass NULL to use lwpr_name from script
00042               file -- but this is only useful for initializing one model)
00043  \param[in]     n_models: number of models to be initialized
00044  
00045  ******************************************************************************/
00046 int
00047 readLWPRScriptMulti(char *fname, int new_flag, int *IDs, char **names, int n_models)
00048      
00049 { 
00050   
00051   int      i,j,k,m,rc=TRUE;
00052   FILE    *in,*out;
00053   char     identification_string[100];
00054   char     string[100];
00055   char     vnames[50][100];
00056   int      ans;
00057   int      changerate=0;
00058   double   d_noise, c_noise;
00059   int      n_in_w=0;
00060   int      n_in_reg=0;
00061   int      n_in_reg_2nd=0;

00107   /* open the script file */
00108 
00109   in  = fopen_strip(fname);
00110   if (in == NULL) {
00111     printf("\nCouldn't read LWPR script file >%s<\n",fname);
00112     return FALSE;
00113   }
00114 
00115   /* check whether this is really a valid script file */
00116   
00117   rc=fscanf(in,"%s",identification_string);
00118   if (strcmp("#LWPR",identification_string) != 0) {
00119     fprintf(stderr,"\nError: Invalid script file!\n");
00120     fprintf(stderr,"A valid script file starts with >#LWPR<\n");
00121     return FALSE;
00122   }
00123 
00124   /* check for included files */
00125   if (find_keyword(in,"include")) {  
00126     char  fname_include[100];
00127     FILE *fp_include;
00128 
00129     rc=fscanf(in,"%s",fname_include);
00130     fp_include = fopen_strip(fname_include);
00131     fseek(fp_include, 0, SEEK_END);
00132     rewind(in);
00133     while ((rc=fgetc(in)) != EOF)
00134       fputc(rc,fp_include);
00135 
00136     fclose(in);
00137     in = fp_include;
00138 
00139     rewind(in);
00140   }
00141     
00142 
00143   /* All the names in file will be parsed. Here I define the names of the
00144      variables. Note that the variables defining the dimensionality of
00145      the LWPR must come first since we need them to allocate other 
00146      variables */
00147 
00148 
00149   i=0;
00150 
00151   /* this block has all variables needed to create a LWPR */
00152   sprintf(vnames[++i],"n_in_w");
00153   sprintf(vnames[++i],"n_in_reg");
00154   sprintf(vnames[++i],"n_out");

00197   out = fopen("lwpr_varnames","w");
00198   for (j=1; j<=i; ++j)

00200   fclose(out);
00201 
00202   /* first we need all the initial variables to create a LWPR */
00203 
00204   i = 0;
00205 
00206   if (!find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00207     printf("Could not find variable >%s<\n",vnames[i]);
00208     return FALSE;
00209   }
00210   rc=fscanf(in,"%d",&n_in_w);
00211   
00212   if (!find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00213     printf("Could not find variable >%s<\n",vnames[i]);
00214     return FALSE;
00215   }

00220     return FALSE;

00225     printf("Could not find variable >%s<\n",vnames[i]);
00226     return FALSE;

00228   rc=fscanf(in,"%d",&diag_only);
00229   
00230   if (!find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00231     printf("Could not find variable >%s<\n",vnames[i]);
00232     return FALSE;
00233   }
00234   rc=fscanf(in,"%d",&allow_meta_learning);
00235   
00236   if (!find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00237     printf("Could not find variable >%s<\n",vnames[i]);
00238     return FALSE;
00239   }
00240   rc=fscanf(in,"%lf",&meta_learning_rate);
00241   
00242   if (!find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00243     printf("Could not find variable >%s<\n",vnames[i]);
00244     return FALSE;
00245   }
00246   rc=fscanf(in,"%lf",&penalty);
00247   
00248   if (!find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00249     printf("Could not find variable >%s<\n",vnames[i]);
00250     return FALSE;
00251   }
00252   rc=fscanf(in,"%lf",&init_alpha);
00253   
00254   if (!find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00255     printf("Could not find variable >%s<\n",vnames[i]);
00256     return FALSE;
00257   }
00258   norm_in_w = my_vector(1,n_in_w);
00259   for (j=1; j<=n_in_w; ++j)
00260     rc=fscanf(in,"%lf",&norm_in_w[j]);
00261   
00262   if (!find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {

00272     return FALSE;

00275   for (j=1; j<=n_out; ++j)
00276     rc=fscanf(in,"%lf",&norm_out[j]);

00278   if (!find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00279     printf("Could not find variable >%s<\n",vnames[i]);
00280     return FALSE;

00282   rc=fscanf(in,"%s",lwpr_name);
00283   
00284   if (find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00285     rc=fscanf(in,"%d",&n_in_reg_2nd);
00286     if (n_in_reg_2nd != 0)
00287       flag_2nd = TRUE;
00288   }
00289   
00290   if (!find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00291     if (flag_2nd) {
00292       printf("Could not find variable >%s<\n",vnames[i]);
00293       return FALSE;
00294     }
00295   } else {
00296     if (flag_2nd) {
00297       rc=fscanf(in,"%d",&n_out_2nd);
00298     }
00299   }
00300 
00301   if (!find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00302     if (flag_2nd) {
00303       printf("Could not find variable >%s<\n",vnames[i]);
00304       return FALSE;
00305     }
00306   } else {
00307     if (flag_2nd) {
00308       norm_in_reg_2nd = my_vector(1,n_in_reg_2nd);
00309       for (j=1; j<=n_in_reg_2nd; ++j)
00310         rc=fscanf(in,"%lf",&norm_in_reg_2nd[j]);
00311     }
00312   }
00313 
00314   if (!find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00315     if (flag_2nd) {
00316       printf("Could not find variable >%s<\n",vnames[i]);
00317       return FALSE;
00318     }
00319   } else {
00320     if (flag_2nd) {
00321       norm_out_2nd = my_vector(1,n_out_2nd);
00322       for (j=1; j<=n_out_2nd; ++j)
00323         rc=fscanf(in,"%lf",&norm_out_2nd[j]);
00324     }
00325   }
00326 
00327   /* this allows to generate the LWPRs */
00328   for (j=1; j<=n_models; ++j) {
00329 
00330     ans = new_flag;
00331     if (names != NULL)
00332       strcpy(lwpr_name,names[j]);
00333 
00334     if (ans) {
00335     
00336       rc = initLWPR(n_in_w, n_in_reg, n_in_reg_2nd, n_out, n_out_2nd, diag_only, 
00337                     allow_meta_learning, meta_learning_rate,penalty, 
00338                     init_alpha, norm_in_w, norm_in_reg, norm_in_reg_2nd, 
00339                     norm_out, norm_out_2nd, lwpr_name, IDs[j], NULL);
00340     
00341     } else {
00342 
00343       rc = readLWPR(IDs[j],lwpr_name);
00344     
00345       if (!rc) {
00346         new_flag = TRUE;
00347         rc = initLWPR(n_in_w, n_in_reg, n_in_reg_2nd, n_out, n_out_2nd, 
00348                       diag_only, allow_meta_learning, meta_learning_rate,penalty, 
00349                       init_alpha, norm_in_w, norm_in_reg, norm_in_reg_2nd, 
00350                       norm_out, norm_out_2nd, 
00351                       lwpr_name, IDs[j], NULL);
00352       }
00353       changeLWPRPenalty(IDs[j],penalty );
00354       changeLWPRMetaLearningRate(IDs[j], meta_learning_rate);
00355       changeLWPRInitAlpha(IDs[j], init_alpha);
00356     
00357     }
00358 
00359   }
00360 
00361   /* check the optional values */
00362 
00363   if (find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00364     rc=fscanf(in,"%ld",&max_rfs);
00365     for (j=1; j<=n_models; ++j)
00366       changeLWPRMaxRFs(IDs[j],max_rfs);
00367   }
00368 
00369   if (find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00370     init_D = my_matrix(1,n_in_w,1,n_in_w);
00371     mat_zero(init_D);
00372     rc=fscanf(in,"%lf",&init_D[1][1]);
00373     for (j=2; j<=n_in_w; ++j) {
00374       init_D[j][j] = init_D[1][1];
00375     }
00376     for (j=1; j<=n_models; ++j)
00377       changeLWPRInitD(IDs[j],init_D);
00378   }
00379   
00380   if (find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00381     init_D = my_matrix(1,n_in_w,1,n_in_w);
00382     for (j=1; j<=n_in_w; ++j) {
00383       rc=fscanf(in,"%lf",&init_D[j][j]);
00384     }
00385     for (j=1; j<=n_models; ++j)
00386       changeLWPRInitD(IDs[j],init_D);
00387   }
00388   
00389   if (find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00390     init_D = my_matrix(1,n_in_w,1,n_in_w);
00391     for (j=1; j<=n_in_w; ++j) {
00392       for (k=1; k<=n_in_w; ++k) {
00393         rc=fscanf(in,"%lf",&init_D[j][k]);
00394       }
00395     }
00396     for (j=1; j<=n_models; ++j)
00397       changeLWPRInitD(IDs[j],init_D);
00398   }
00399

00401     rc=fscanf(in,"%lf",&init_lambda);

00404   }

00406   if (find_keyword(in,vnames[++i])) {
00407     rc=fscanf(in,"%d",&init_n_proj);

00409       changeLWPRInitNProj(IDs[j],init_n_proj);
00410   }

00539 
00540 /*!*****************************************************************************
00541  *******************************************************************************
00542  \note  readLWPRScript
00543  \date  February 1996
00544  
00545  \remarks 
00546  
00547  reads the script file which creates a LWPR
00548  
00549  *******************************************************************************
00550  Function Parameters: [in]=input,[out]=output
00551  
00552  \param[in]     fname   : name of the script
00553  \param[in]     new_flag: TRUE = force the creation of a new LWPR
00554               FALSE = try to read the LWPR from file first
00555  \param[in]     ID      : which ID number should this LWPR have     
00556  
00557  ******************************************************************************/
00558 int
00559 readLWPRScript(char *fname, int new_flag, int ID)
00560      
00561 { 
00562   
00563   int      i,j;
00564   int      IDs[1+1];
00565 
00566   IDs[1] = ID;
00567 
00568   return readLWPRScriptMulti(fname, new_flag, IDs, NULL, 1);
00569   
00570 }
